statements: SELECT * FROM ProductLifecycle
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM ProductLifecycle
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, lifecycle_stage FROM ProductLifecycle
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductLifecycle WHERE manufacturer='Company A'
SELECT * FROM ProductLifecycle ORDER BY production_date DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ProductLifecycle ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductLifecycle WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT DISTINCT lifecycle_stage FROM ProductLifecycle;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM ProductLifecycle WHERE production_date >= '2021-01-01' AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductLifecycle WHERE lifecycle_stage IN ('Development', 'Testing') ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production WHERE production_location = 'Factory A';
SELECT product_id, production_date, production_location FROM production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Warehouse B';
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date FROM disposal ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production WHERE production_location = 'Factory A' AND production_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, production_location FROM production WHERE product_id = 1001 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_products FROM production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.product_name, d.disposal_location FROM production p JOIN disposal d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.disposal_method = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM production WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%' AND production_location IN ('Warehouse A','Warehouse B') ORDER BY production_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Production ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Production WHERE production_location = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, production_location FROM Production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND production_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM Disposal GROUP BY disposal_location HAVING total_disposals > 3;
SELECT * FROM Production WHERE product_name = 'Chair';
SELECT * FROM Production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT P.product_name, I.quantity, D.disposal_location FROM Production P JOIN Inventory I ON P.product_id = I.product_id JOIN Disposal D ON I.inventory_id = D.inventory_id;
SELECT DISTINCT P.production_location FROM Production P JOIN Inventory I ON P.product_id = I.product_id JOIN Disposal D ON I.inventory_id = D.inventory_id WHERE D.disposal_date < '2022-07-31';
SELECT * FROM Production;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Production;
SELECT product_name, production_location FROM Production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Distribution WHERE distribution_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, consumer_name, consumption_date FROM Consumption WHERE consumer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Production;
SELECT product_name, production_location FROM Production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT production_location FROM Production;
SELECT product_name FROM Production WHERE production_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_name, distribution_date FROM Distribution JOIN Production ON Distribution.product_id = Production.product_id ORDER BY distribution_date;
SELECT * FROM production WHERE product_name = 'Shoes';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT production_location, production_quantity FROM production WHERE production_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE transport_from = 'New York' ORDER BY transport_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_date, disposition_method FROM disposal WHERE disposed_quantity < 50 ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, production_location, production_quantity FROM production WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT production_quantity, product_name FROM production WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE transport_from = 'Warehouse A' AND transport_to = 'Retail Store B'
SELECT distributor_name, distribution_method, distribution_location FROM distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
